questions: What is the process to use PostgreSQL with Tracardi?
How to install the PostgreSQL extension in Tracardi?
Is PostgreSQL a free and open-source RDBMS?
answer:
# Can Tracardi use PostgreSQL, a free and open-source relational database management system (RDBMS) emphasizing extensibility and SQL compliance?
Yes. To use PostgreSQL, install the extension PostgreSQL in Resource/Extensions.
